meanings.definition: The act or process of bringing goods or services into a country from abroad.
meanings.sent1: The importation of exotic fruits increased the variety in our local market.
meanings.sent2: Customs officers oversee the importation of goods at the border.
meanings.sent3: The comedy skit humorously portrayed a mix-up during an importation inspection.
meanings.sent4: Her love for foreign films led to an importation of DVDs from different countries.
meanings.sent5: The importation of spices from distant lands added a new flavor to the cuisine.

meanings.definition: The act of bringing something from one place to another.
meanings.sent1: The importation of building materials was crucial for the construction project.
meanings.sent2: The company's success relied on the efficient importation of raw materials.
meanings.sent3: The children's game involved an imaginative importation of treasures from a magical land.
meanings.sent4: His storytelling skills made the importation of ideas from books come alive for the audience.
meanings.sent5: The importation of knowledge from different cultures broadened their understanding of the world.

meanings.definition: The act of introducing something new or different.
meanings.sent1: The importation of innovative technology revolutionized the industry.
meanings.sent2: The designer's collection featured the importation of bold colors and patterns.
meanings.sent3: The school play showcased an unexpected importation of humor into a serious scene.
meanings.sent4: Her speech was an importation of fresh perspectives that inspired the audience.
meanings.sent5: The art exhibition displayed an importation of unconventional techniques that captivated viewers.
